Issue.creator: c0rwin
Issue.summary: Make KVLedger to implement RawLedger interface
Issue.description: Currently {{KVLedger}} implements only {{ValidatedLedger}} interface while it also should be able to provide {{RawLedger}} interface capabilities. As {{KVLedger}} used by committer service and currently gossip component distributes raw blocks {{KVLedger}} has to comply with {{RawLedger}} iterface
